root.tabTitileStr: Sender set;Data set;Key&mouse set;Receiver set;System set;
root.sendModeCmbStr: Send choose addr;Send choose data;Send blank data;Send edit data;Send all datas;
root.textIPEdtCommentStr: The OSC sender IP,the local IP 127.0.0.1.
root.textPortEdtCommentStr: The OSC sender port number,the default is 12345.
root.openBtnCommentStr: OSC transmitter turned on or off , make sure the correct IP and port.
root.addBtnCommentStr: Add the OSC data to list on the right.
root.delBtnCommentStr: Delete the selected data on the left.
root.clearBtnCommentStr: Clear all datas of the right list.
root.modifyBtnCommentStr: Update data to the right of the selected row.
root.textDataEdtCommentStr: OSC data,make sure that the data and the type match.
root.textTimesEdtCommentStr: The times of OSC massages sent cycles.
root.textSpacingEdtCommentStr: The interval between the two sent in milliseconds (ms).
root.sendModeCmbCommentStr: Select the desired transmission mode ,there are four transmission modes.
root.sendAsMsgCommentStr: Checked, the data to be sent as a message, otherwise it is sent as a bundle.
root.sendBtnCommentStr: Send or stop sending,please make sure the OSC sender has been opened.
root.textRPortEdtCommentStr: The OSC receiver port number,the default is 12345.
root.supportACKModeCommentStr: ACK mode,receives data in the address blank will return data that address.
root.readBtnCommentStr: Read the last saved configuration data from "config.xml".
root.addKMBtnCommentStr: Add the map to the map list.
root.delKMBtnCommentStr: Delete selected row in the map list.
root.clearKMBtnCommentStr: Clear map list on the left.
root.modifyKMBtnCommentStr: Update data to the left row selected in the list.
